author: Jonathan Cross
comment: Why can't I disable "full network access"? This app doesn't need network access at all. Also sad it's not open source, don't know what it is doing.

author: Kari Guenther
comment: On my tablet I have to keep reinstalling it. Works fine on phone but I want a backup device if phone isn't working.

author: Kishor Kumar Challa
comment: I am not getting approve option in notification in my android mobile. Every time I need to click on notification and it goes to app and there I need to click on right(✔️) option. Please provide me solution for this. I need notification with approve option.

author: Daisuke O
comment: Bloated. Unnecessary, annoying visual effects that delay the function of the app.

author: Franck Dernoncourt
comment: Visual effects unnecessarily delay the display of the code

author: Kiran Kumar Potnuru
comment: Verification approval request token stopped working since couple of months which was a key feature and very quick way to authenticate

author: Super Semko
comment: Slow. Especially for a simple generator like this

author: Boris B
comment: Doesn't work on note 8

author: Nilabh Verma
comment: Good app but sometimes stuck.

author: Aman Vyas
comment: How can I switch my credentials id? Everything else is good.

author: Keshava Iyengar
comment: EMC RSA and it's soft token was the best. Symantec is nowhere closer to what Dell EMC offers.

author: K.R. Siebs
comment: Norton is on top of the game #1 for security in my opinion!👮

author: B H
comment: Missing dark theme

author: Carl Lawler
comment: I don't get the code, why?

author: Yue Meng Ng
comment: It's really easy and convenient

author: Mark Kennedy
comment: Watch support is great!

author: Kristie Hill
comment: nice
Good

author: Yaser Arafath
comment: It is the fourth time am reinstalling the software today. Am really getting frustrated on using the application. Initially I installed this software for the first time - past April 2016 for more than a year there was no problem. But the issue stated from past two months. And still no fix even after updating the software the latest version. Kindly work on it and try to resolve the issue. I hope this will review helpful for you to improve your application. Many Thanks.

reply.author: Symantec VIP
reply.content:
We apologize the inconvenience caused. Please verify your Credential ID at https://vip.symantec.com.

If you still have issues, write to us at vip_mobilesupport@symantec.com.

We will investigate this issue and provide an update.

author: Reichard Könige
comment: I guess I'm one of they few that never had a problem with this app. I use Norton for just about everything. My only complaint is they prayer the hell out of you with "spam" and no unsubscribe. But that's a different issue. The reason for 3 stars and not 5 is because unlike Google authenticator the Android Wear screen only shows you the main auth for code. If you set up other websites with two factor authentication using this app you can't swipe left on your watch to get the code for the website you are logging into. As such I only use this for one website.

author: Vanist Meira
comment: They fight malware by hiring malware creatores. Makes perfect sense right? Hire the people who hacked you in the first place.... Norton is the worst cyber security company globally. Your better off buying freeware or Avira.

author: Justin Nagle
comment: Only works half the time.  Not updated efficiently, to maintain functionality on new Android versions.  Edit:  Been a few weeks now and it's still broken.  One thing i learned, never trust Symantec with Enterprise.  They fall to even keep their app up to date.  I guess it's not meant for business/Enterprise use?  Not surprising to see this type of thing from Symantec

author: vishal lad
comment: I have honor 8 pro..  I always get the error showing my phone does not support proximity.Hence I am unable to pair my mobile device.  Not sure how to fix this. Any help on this would be appreciated. I also saw similar error on Honor 7x

author: Karin Sundstrom
comment: App crashes on Galaxy A5 after software updates, need this app to access work related documents and can only use from one device. The app needs to be faster updated to avoid problems like this.

reply.author: Symantec VIP
reply.content: The VIP Access app crash issues were observed on Samsung Galaxy A5 and A7 devices where vendor missed shipping the required libraries. Symantec recommends updating your OS to the latest Android 7.x version, which should resolve this issue.

author: Damien Allen
comment: Terrible. Works fine for weeks then dies, error 4002. Leaves me stuck trying to cover work remotely over the holidays and can't login. Has to be made recoverable.

author: Juliene
comment: Love the feature that shows the code on the screen without opening the app. Unfortunately, app doesn't work with split screen, making registration and authentication of other apps on the phone VERY difficult.  Would be five stars with split screen enabled.

author: Billdoss Samson
comment: The app used to be very useful to access our company's secured site. After update to Android 7 app is not working. I'm getting error code 5007 - unable to activate it. Please help

author: Junkang Li
comment: App keeps crashing when I try to open it after having upgraded to Nougat. Had to uninstall and reinstall to get it to work again.

author: Ronald Joseph Santor
comment: The app has a very nice UI. However, I can't seem to locate the option for fingerprint unlock as advertised in the apps description. I really liked Norton apps but knowing that this authenticator app does not support manual keying of codes instead of QR Codes makes me think twice in using this app. Please fix the issues and this app will be the best one in the market. 😊

author: Sachin Somanna
comment: Y have removed the refresh button? The key does not work many times. And now since u removed the refresh button, we have close and reopen the app to have a new code which works. No other work around works. My entire team is facing this issue.

author: John P.
comment: Stopped working after my Nexus 6P was upgraded to Android 8.0.0.  I believe the Android upgrade changed my SYMC code changed. After reinstall and updating MyNorton account with the NEW SYMC code it has started working again.
Update: Folks whose app is crashing continuously after the update, try restarting your phone and then reinstalling the app. Worked for me.

author: Theresa Wilson
comment: No longer working . Initially it was just giving me all zeros for my number. Uninstalled it then reinstalled it and it was giving me a code but it never works with my bank account . I now have to visit my branch each time I need to pay a new customer.

reply.author: Symantec VIP
reply.content:
We apologize the inconvenience caused. Symantec recommends re-registering your new Credential ID with your bank or your financial institute.

If you still have issues, write to us at vip_mobilesupport@symantec.com

author: Sarah B
comment: Troublesome  Used Norton for years but cannot get past the screen which says create account, then I get an E500 error

reply.author: Symantec VIP
reply.content:
VIP Access is a free app that protects your online accounts and transactions by providing strong, two-factor authentication when logging into your VIP-enabled accounts. 

You can learn more about these features at https://vip.symantec.com.

If you still have issues, write to us at vip_mobilesupport@symantec.com.

comment: With version 4.1.1, proximity is broken. It was working fine before VIP Access upgrade.

comment: This app does not work reinstalling over and over again and it still does not work. Just keeps saying the code does not exist.
